channel.title: This is Alex Zhang
channel.description: Recent content on This is Alex Zhang

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hello, I am Chao Zhang (aka Alex Zhang), I am a System Development Engineer of UPYUN Inc. My Email is zchao1995@gmail.com and the github ID is tokers (Why “tokers”? Because “Alex” is a mutex).

I am the contributor of the ngx_lua project. In addition, I devote to learn Nginx, Redis, OpenSSL and other projects.

This site is being used as my tech blog, interesting things will be archived (in Chinese, sure :)).
